'''Moment of Bloom''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 2.2]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2021-11-02 18:00:00 &ndash; 2021-11-23 14:59:59

===Summary===
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Fragrance in Thaw" [[Hu Tao]] ({{Pyro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Protector From Afar" [[Thoma]] ({{Pyro}}), "Kätzlein Cocktail" [[Diona]] ({{Cryo}}), and "Mujina Ninja" [[Sayu]] ({{Anemo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* After this event wish ends, the 4-star character "Protector From Afar" [[Thoma]] ({{Pyro}}) will be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]" in [[Version 2.3]].
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish [[Wanderlust Invocation]].
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
